title: Antinatalism Collection
description:
Collection of books, articles, essays, etc. related to antinatalism.


Contents:

Anti-Natalism: Rejectionist Philosophy from Buddhism to Benatar - Ken Coates
Assessing Antinatalism: A Philosophical Examination of the Morality of Procreation - Asheel Singh
Benatar and the Logic of Betterness - Ben Bradley
Better Never to Have Been: The Harm of Coming Into Existence - David Benatar
Confessions of an Antinatalist - Jim Crawford
Every Conceivable Harm: A Further Defense of Antinatalism - David Benatar
Is 'being born' in the best interest of the child? Ideology of reproduction vs. non-suffering (abstract) - Jean-Christophe Lurenbaum

The Conspiracy Against the Human Race - Thomas Ligotti
The Last Messiah - Peter Wessel Zapffe
The Trouble With Being Born - E. M. Cioran
